Description: Current owed amount on the loan. Represented as an integer
Current credit Score. Represented as an integer
Total annual income. Represented as an integer
Monthly amount owed in bills seperate from loans and credit. Represented as a float
Number of years with credit history. Represented as a float.
Current owed amount on all credit cards. Represented as an integer
Total credit card limit. Represented as an integer
Interest rate applied to loan and credit debt. Represented as a float
Loan Term Length. Categorical value [1 year, 3 year, 5 year, 7 year, 10 year, 15 year, 30 year]
Current home ownership status. Categorical value  [Rent, Home Mortgage, Home Owner]
The purpose for needing the loan. Categorical value  [Home Improvements, Business Loan, Car Loan, Home Loan, Medical Bills, Educational Expenses]
Length of employment at current job.  Categorical value [1 Year or Less, 2 - 4 years, 5 - 7 years, 8 - 9 years, 10+ years]
